articles.author: Justin Kroll
articles.title: Jodie Comer, Aaron Taylor-Johnson & Ralph Fiennes To Star In ‘28 Years Later’ For Danny Boyle And Sony Pictures - Deadline
articles.description: Aaron Taylor-Johnson, Jodie Comer and Ralph Fiennes have boarded Danny Boyle’s 28 Years Later, a sequel movie to 28 Days Later.
articles.content: EXCLUSIVE: The new 28 Years Latertrilogy from director Danny Boyle and Sony Pictures is gaining momentum, and some serious star power. Sources tell Deadline that Jodie Comer, Aaron Taylor-Johnson and… [+2503 chars]

articles.author: Bryan Alexander
articles.title: 'Shogun' ending, explained: Episode 10 recap from Hiroyuki Sanada - USA TODAY
articles.description: "Shogun" star and producer Hiroyuki Sanada explains how his embattled Yoshii Toranaga masterfully manuevered in the acclaimed FX series' finale.
articles.content:
Spoiler alert! The following article includes details of FX's"Shogun" finale.
Never count out Yoshii Toranaga in "Shogun."
